title: Domain of Even Roots
text: When there is an even root in the formula, we exclude any real numbers that result in a negative number in the radicand.

title: Domain of Even Roots
text: To get the domain of f, we can set the radicand greater than or equal to zero and solve for $$x$$. i.e. Solve the inequality $$x^3-64 \geq 0$$.
